name: interface/page/fill
description: Fill form fields on a web page. Use interface/page/forms first to discover available forms and their fields. This command fills fields but does NOT submit - use interface/page/submit after filling.

params.name: url
params.description: The URL of the page containing the form

params.name: values
params.description: Object mapping field names to values, e.g. {"from": "NYC", "to": "LAX"}

params.name: waitForSelector
params.description: CSS selector to wait for before filling

results.name: success
results.description: Whether all fields were filled successfully

results.name: filledFields
results.description: List of field names that were successfully filled

results.name: failedFields
results.description: Fields that could not be filled, with reasons

results.name: remainingRequired
results.description: Required fields that still need values

results.name: hint
results.description: Guidance on next steps (submit if ready, or fill remaining required fields)

results.name: error
results.description: Error message if operation failed entirely

reason.description: Why the field could not be filled
